price: Sai (al'ummar) suka yanyanke al'amarinsu a tsakãninsu guntu-guntu,* kõwace ƙungiya sunã mãsu farin ciki da abin da yake a gare su.
arabic: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ زُبُرٗاۖ كُلُّ حِزۡبِۭ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِحُونَ
footnotes: * Kõwa ya kãma hanyarsa, al'ummar Musulmi ta zama ƙungiyõyi dabam-dabam, kõwanensu yanã farin ciki da abin da ke gare shi, yanã ganin shi ne mafifici

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fataqaṭṭaʿū amrahum baynahum zuburan kullu ḥiz'bin bimā ladayhim fariḥūna
